definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to maintain/to keep up/to hold together

sentences.english: Many people overestimate the benefits of vitamin C and other antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 許多人高估了維C和其它抗氧化劑的好處。

sentences.english: TAPAS BAR offers Spanish cuisine. The price is reasonable and the environment is extraordinary.
sentences.chinese: 三樂維提供西班牙菜，以價格適中和環境幽雅出衆。

sentences.english: Um, Marv, can we look after Sizzles?.
sentences.chinese: 馬維，可以讓我們照顧西索嗎？

sentences.english: ConclusionRisperidone effectual procedure showed a rule of exponential curve.
sentences.chinese: 結論維思通的起效過程呈指數曲線規律。

sentences.english: So Falvey decided to get into the franchising business, too.
sentences.chinese: 所以福爾維決定進入特許經營業務了。

sentences.english: It should be added to the new Iraq , one day, Victoria D, to promote the absorption of calcium.
sentences.chinese: 應該補充伊可新，一天一顆，是維D，促進鈣的吸收。

sentences.english: And the applicability of Virial theorem is not clear either.
sentences.chinese: 而且維裏定理對此類系統的適用性也沒有明確結論。

sentences.english: Mr Uribe freed scores of guerrilla prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 烏里維釋放了數位被捕的游擊隊員。

sentences.english: Vietor and Kiriakou declined to comment for this article.
sentences.chinese: 對於本文的相關內容，維託和克里亞庫拒絕發表評論。

sentences.english: A forensic scientist there tells Holloway’s father it’s bone from a human female.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的法醫學家告訴哈勒維的父親這個骨頭是女性的。

sentences.english: Menton is the last city on the French side of the Riviera, beyond it is Italian territory.
sentences.chinese: 芒通是法國裏維艾拉的最後一個城市，與意大利相連。

sentences.english: The day before the Riverdale Meet, Coach called me over.
sentences.chinese: 在裏維代爾運動會的前一天，教練把我叫了過去。

sentences.english: Mr. Weirich, the agriculture secretary, said he was skeptical about that.
sentences.chinese: 農業部長維裏奇先生說，他懷疑這一點。

sentences.english: Virginia hall dressed as a farm worker.
sentences.chinese: 維吉利亞？哈爾打扮成一個農場工人。

sentences.english: Vritra ninety-nine fortresses, and then came upon the dragon .
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅摧毀了維他的九十九座城堡，然後與維他交手。

sentences.english: Vritra ninety-nine fortresses, and then came upon the dragon .
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅摧毀了維他的九十九座城堡，然後與維他交手。

definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
